name: Happy Claus Christmas Edition
description:
Happy Claus: Christmas Edition - a fun arcade about the adventures of Santa Claus on the night before Christmas.
You have to feel yourself in the role of Santa Claus and fly through the pipes of the fireplaces to deliver the presents to the children.
It will take a lot of courage and agility to not touch one of the pipes or fall to the ground, because then you will open.

Features:

- A decent complexity
- Cheerful gameplay
- Excellent soundtrack
- The spirit of Christmas
- Ease of management
- Colorful winter landscapes
